Package ElevatorSubsystem

Class ElevatorSystem

java.lang.Object
ElevatorSubsystem.ElevatorSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ElevatorSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Author:
Michael Quach, Harjap Gill, Jason Gao Receives messages from the Scheduler. Based on the message type, determines the correct interaction with the corresponding elevator and returns any confirmation messages back to the scheduler

    Method for forwarding ServiceFloorRequest to the correct elevator and then waits to receive the confirmation message back from that elevator
    void run()
    Forwards messages from the scheduler to the corresponding Elevator and enables message forwarding back

    • ElevatorSystem

      public ElevatorSystem​(ByteBufferCommunicator bufferCommunicator, java.util.ArrayList<Elevator> elevators)
      Constructs an ElevatorSystem.
      Parameters:
      bufferCommunicator - An instance of a buffer communicator object
      elevators - a reference to the elevators for this system

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Forwards messages from the scheduler to the corresponding Elevator and enables message forwarding back
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • createConfirmationMessage

      private Message createConfirmationMessage​(java.lang.Integer elevatorId, ServiceFloorRequestMessage serviceFloorRequestMessage)
      Method for forwarding ServiceFloorRequest to the correct elevator and then waits to receive the confirmation message back from that elevator
      Parameters:
      elevatorId - the id of the elevator who should receive the message
      serviceFloorRequestMessage - message to be sent to the elevator
      Returns:
      confirmationMessage from elevator to determine if the request is accepted or declined
